java/liquibase/change/AddUniqueConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.AddUniqueConstraintStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class AddUniqueConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00020 
00021     private String schemaName;
00022     private String tableName;
00023     private String columnNames;
00024     private String constraintName;
00025     private String tablespace;
00026 
00027     public AddUniqueConstraintChange() {
00028         super("addUniqueConstraint", "Add Unique Constraint");
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getSchemaName() {
00032         return schemaName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00036         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getTableName() {
00040         return tableName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00044         this.tableName = tableName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getColumnNames() {
00048         return columnNames;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setColumnNames(String columnNames) {
00052         this.columnNames = columnNames;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getConstraintName() {
00056         return constraintName;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00060         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00064     public String getTablespace() {
00065         return tablespace;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00069         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00073         AddUniqueConstraintStatement statement = new AddUniqueConstraintStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnNames(), getConstraintName());
00074         statement.setTablespace(getTablespace());
00075 
00076         return new SqlStatement[] { statement };
00077     }
00078 
00079     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00080         return "Unique constraint added to "+getTableName()+"("+getColumnNames()+")";
00081     }
00082 
00083     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00084         DropUniqueConstraintChange inverse = new DropUniqueConstraintChange();
00085         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00086         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00087         inverse.setConstraintName(getConstraintName());
00088 
00089         return new Change[]{
00090                 inverse,
00091         };
00092     }
00093 
00094     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00095         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00096         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00097             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00098         }
00099         if (getTablespace() != null) {
00100             element.setAttribute("tablespace", getTablespace());            
00101         }
00102 
00103         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00104         element.setAttribute("columnNames", getColumnNames());
00105         element.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00106 
00107         return element;
00108     }
00109 
00110     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00111 
00112         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00113 
00114         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00115         returnSet.add(table);
00116 
00117         for (String columnName : getColumnNames().split(",")) {
00118             Column column = new Column();
00119             column.setTable(table);
00120             column.setName(columnName.trim());
00121 
00122             returnSet.add(column);
00123         }
00124 
00125         return returnSet;
00126 
00127     }
00128 
00129 }
